Body:
alg = op.algorithms.TransientFickianDiffusion(network=self.net, phase=self.
    phase)
alg.setup(quantity='pore.concentration', conductance=
    'throat.diffusive_conductance', t_initial=0, t_final=1000, t_step=1,
    t_output=100, t_tolerance=1e-08, t_scheme='implicit')
alg.set_IC(0)
alg.set_value_BC(pores=self.net.pores('back'), values=1)
alg.set_value_BC(pores=self.net.pores('front'), values=0)
alg.run()
x = [0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.33333, 0.33333, 0.33333, 0.66667, 0.66667, 0.66667, 
    1.0, 1.0, 1.0]
y = np.around(alg[alg.settings['quantity']], decimals=5)
assert np.all(x == y)
